thread.title: BRIEF-TechTarget Q4 Revenue $30.3 Million Versus $26.7 Million

title: BRIEF-TechTarget Q4 Revenue $30.3 Million Versus $26.7 Million
text:
45 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-TechTarget Q4 Revenue $30.3 Million Versus $26.7 Million Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Techtarget Inc: * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $30.3 MILLION VERSUS $26.7 MILLION 
* FOR Q1 2018, EXPECT REVENUES TO BE BETWEEN $26.0 MILLION AND $27.0 MILLION 
* FOR 2018, EXPECT REVENUES TO BE BETWEEN $121.0 AND $123.0 MILLION 
* FOR Q1 2018, EXPECT ADJUSTED EBITDA TO BE BETWEEN $3.5 MILLION AND $4.5 MILLION 
* FOR 2018, EXPECT ADJUSTED EBITDA TO BE BETWEEN $28.0 AND $30.0 MILLION * QTRLY NET INCOME PER COMMON SHARE $0.12 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.15, REVENUE VIEW $30.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 REVENUE VIEW $27.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* FY2017 REVENUE VIEW $108.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $122.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* FY 2017 TOTAL REVENUE $108.6 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
